TONE CURVE


With reference to a tone curve, adjust the
appearance of highlights or shadows,
making them harsher or softer. Choose
higher values to make shadows and
highlights harsher, lower values to make
them softer.


OptionDescription
HIGHLIGHTS-2 to +4
SHADOWS2 to +4
COLOR
Adjust color density.
Options
-4-3-2-10+1+2+3+4
SHARPNESS
Sharpen or soften outlines.
Options
-4-3-2-10+1+2+3+4
HIGH ISO NR
Reduce noise in pictures taken at high sensitivities. Choose high- er values to reduce noise and smooth outlines, lower values to leave outlines visible.

content.markdown:
# TONE CURVE

With reference to a tone curve, adjust the
appearance of highlights or shadows,
making them harsher or softer. Choose
higher values to make shadows and
highlights harsher, lower values to make
them softer.

| Option |  | Description | Description | Description | Description | Description | Description | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| HIGHLIGHTS | HIGHLIGHTS | -2 to +4 | -2 to +4 | -2 to +4 | -2 to +4 | -2 to +4 | -2 to +4 | -2 to +4 |
| SHADOWS | SHADOWS | 2 to +4 | 2 to +4 | 2 to +4 | 2 to +4 | 2 to +4 | 2 to +4 | 2 to +4 |
| COLOR | COLOR | COLOR | COLOR | COLOR | COLOR | COLOR | COLOR | COLOR |
| Adjust color density. | Adjust color density. | Adjust color density. | Adjust color density. | Adjust color density. | Adjust color density. | Adjust color density. | Adjust color density. | Adjust color density. |
| Options | Options | Options | Options | Options | Options | Options | Options | Options |
| -4 | -3 | -2 | -1 | 0 | +1 | +2 | +3 | +4 |
| SHARPNESS | SHARPNESS | SHARPNESS | SHARPNESS | SHARPNESS | SHARPNESS | SHARPNESS | SHARPNESS | SHARPNESS |
| Sharpen or soften outlines. | Sharpen or soften outlines. | Sharpen or soften outlines. | Sharpen or soften outlines. | Sharpen or soften outlines. | Sharpen or soften outlines. | Sharpen or soften outlines. | Sharpen or soften outlines. | Sharpen or soften outlines. |
| Options | Options | Options | Options | Options | Options | Options | Options | Options |
| -4 | -3 | -2 | -1 | 0 | +1 | +2 | +3 | +4 |
| HIGH ISO NR | HIGH ISO NR | HIGH ISO NR | HIGH ISO NR | HIGH ISO NR | HIGH ISO NR | HIGH ISO NR | HIGH ISO NR | HIGH ISO NR |
| Reduce noise in pictures taken at high sensitivities. Choose high- er values to reduce noise and smooth outlines, lower values to leave outlines visible. | Reduce noise in pictures taken at high sensitivities. Choose high- er values to reduce noise and smooth outlines, lower values to leave outlines visible. | Reduce noise in pictures taken at high sensitivities. Choose high- er values to reduce noise and smooth outlines, lower values to leave outlines visible. | Reduce noise in pictures taken at high sensitivities. Choose high- er values to reduce noise and smooth outlines, lower values to leave outlines visible. | Reduce noise in pictures taken at high sensitivities. Choose high- er values to reduce noise and smooth outlines, lower values to leave outlines visible. | Reduce noise in pictures taken at high sensitivities. Choose high- er values to reduce noise and smooth outlines, lower values to leave outlines visible. | Reduce noise in pictures taken at high sensitivities. Choose high- er values to reduce noise and smooth outlines, lower values to leave outlines visible. | Reduce noise in pictures taken at high sensitivities. Choose high- er values to reduce noise and smooth outlines, lower values to leave outlines visible. |
